name: wasteyarn scrunchie
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
finished measurements:	9,0 cm ø

yarn:		                approx. 20g waste yarn
				
needles:			       double pointed needles 
				       in either 2mm | 3mm | 4mm

utilities:			       sewing needle, stitch marker

other:			       elastic hair tie 4,5-5,0cm ø

select a needle size that matches your yarn leftovers. you can find the ideal needle size on the label of your yarn. 

the pattern is beginner friendly! 

feel free to contact me on instagram if you have any questions.
